My Games

Hyrule Warriors

A hack-and-slash game set in the Zelda universe, featuring iconic characters and intense battles.

Year: 2014

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U

Game & Wario

A collection of mini-games starring Wario and his friends, utilizing the Wii U GamePad's features.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U

Animal Crossing: Amiibo Festival

A party game set in the Animal Crossing universe, featuring amiibo integration and board game mechanics.

Year: 2015

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U

NES Remix

A compilation of classic NES games with new challenges and remixed gameplay.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U

Scribblenauts Unlimited

A puzzle game where players can create any object by writing its name to solve challenges.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment

Console: Wii U
